name: Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V

participants.name: Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V
participants.committee_id: ~{"name": "Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V"}

agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM, Monday, February 25, 2019 PLACE: JHR 100 CHAIR: Rep. Oscar Longoria The Appropriations Subcommittee on Articles I, IV, & V will meet in a formal meeting to discuss House budget recommendations. The Subcommittee will be working on Article I and Article V. As a reminder no public or agency testimony may be taken during a formal meeting.
